Human Hair Wigs for Black Women-Glueless Full Lace Wigs with Baby Hair Brazilian Hair Water Wave 130% Density Natural Color 20inch
{'Material': 'Human', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Special Feature': 'Glueless', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '11.81 x 5.51 x 2.76 inches; 9.12 Ounces', 'UPC': '602731543407'}
This wig is a great value for the price. The hair is very soft and doesnt tangle. Minimum shedding, nothing major or beyond average. The density is on the low side so it gives a natural appearance. If you like big, diva hair you might now like the 130% density.
Great wig for the price! Good Value

N3 No Name Necessary Pore-Minimizing Mattifying Oil and Shine Control Anti-aging Makeup Face Primer Spray (200ml)
No Name Necessary
{'Brand': 'No Name Necessary', 'Skin Type': 'Combination', 'Package Information': 'Bottle', 'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Specialty': 'Mattifying', 'Product Dimensions': '1.7 x 1.7 x 7.5 inches; 8.78 Ounces'}
This primer is nothing short of amazing. The mist that a nozzle gives is a huge deal when it comes to coverage. Some times if the mist is too much its just too messy. But the mist on this one is so fine I barely felt anything on my face when I was applying it and had to be sure that I was even getting product on my faec and opened my eyes to check. I did use more than the recommended amount, which I found to be a bit on the low side since the size of the mist is so small the amount of product that you get out on a single spray is minimum. After I applied, I watched in the mirror as it dried, and the effects were amazing. My shine do go away and I could literally see my pore getting smaller. I could see myself using this alone on a hot summer day without makeup because the finish it gave was just that great. My makeup also went on very easy and smooth and felt as if it was gliding across my face and not going into every wrinkle and groove. I didn't wear my makeup anything close to 16 hours but I did make it through a 8 hour workday flawless. Defiantly a staple now in my makeup bag.
Very fine mist

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

The user continues to showcase a strong preference for human hair wigs that offer a natural appearance and manageability, especially favoring wavy styles for their blend of aesthetic appeal and practicality. Their recent purchase of a frontal closure illustrates a desire for versatile styling options while prioritizing quality.

In their exploration of beauty products, the user recently reviewed a mattifying primer, reflecting a discerning approach to efficacy and performance, highlighting an appreciation for fine application techniques and effective results. They favor products that enhance their beauty routines subtly rather than dramatically.

Additionally, the user has expressed a pronounced interest in comfortable, everyday eye enhancement, as evidenced by their recent purchase of lashes that are ideal for daily wear. This aligns with their established high standards, emphasizing value and quality across hair, skincare, and cosmetic preferences.

The user remains keen on modern, glueless wig styles that prioritize convenience and understated elegance. They consistently select products that provide practical beauty solutions while embracing current trends, seeking effective results that embody a sleek aesthetic.

Overall, their profile reflects a lifestyle dedicated to balancing everyday beauty with modern elegance, consistently favoring items that enhance their routine without being overly extravagant.
